pr_title: [#2239] Add OpenAPI spec and prepare base classes for the new tenants search operation

timeline.bodyText: how about using a copy of the given list in order to prevent (unintended) changes to the result after creation of the SearchResult instance?
timeline.author: sophokles73
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -0,0 +1,68 @@ +/******************************************************************************* + * Copyright (c) 2020 Contributors to the Eclipse Foundation + * + * See the NOTICE file(s) distributed with this work for additional + * information regarding copyright ownership. + * + * This program and the accompanying materials are made available under the + * terms of the Eclipse Public License 2.0 which is available at + * http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0 + * + * SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0 + *******************************************************************************/ +package org.eclipse.hono.service.management; + +import java.util.List; +import java.util.Objects; + +import org.eclipse.hono.util.RegistryManagementConstants; + +import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude; +import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty; + +/** + * The result of a search operation in Device Registry Management API. + * + * @param The type of the result. + * @see Device Registry + * Management API - Search Tenants + * @see Device Registry + * Management API - Search Devices + */ +@JsonInclude(value = JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL) +public final class SearchResult { + private final int total; + private final List result; + + /** + * Creates an instance of {@link SearchResult}. + * + * @param total The total number of objects in the result set, regardless of the pageSize set in query. + * @param result The list of devices with their identifiers. + * @throws NullPointerException if any of the parameters is {@code null}. + */ + public SearchResult( + @JsonProperty(value = RegistryManagementConstants.FIELD_RESULT_SET_SIZE) final int total, + @JsonProperty(value = RegistryManagementConstants.FIELD_RESULT_SET_PAGE) final List result) { + this.total = total; + this.result = Objects.requireNonNull(result);

timeline.bodyText: Do you expect this class to be created from JSON? My understanding is that this will be included in the response body only, right?

replies.bodyText:
Do you expect this class to be created from JSON?

We are creating from JSON in the integration tests.
replies.author: kaniyan

timeline.author: sophokles73
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -65,6 +71,43 @@ */ Future> readTenant(String tenantId, Span span); + /** + * Finds tenants with optional filters, paging and sorting options. + *

+ * This search operation is considered as optional since it is not required for the normal functioning of Hono and + * is more of a convenient operation. Hence here it is declared as a default method which returns + * {@link HttpURLConnection#HTTP_NOT_IMPLEMENTED}. It is upto the implementors of this interface to offer an

replies.bodyText: Thanks for pointing out, I have corrected it.
replies.author: kaniyan

timeline.message:
[#2239] Implement review suggestions

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

timeline.bodyText: how about returning an unmodifiable view on the list instead to prevent (unintended) alterations?
timeline.author: sophokles73
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -0,0 +1,71 @@ +/******************************************************************************* + * Copyright (c) 2020 Contributors to the Eclipse Foundation + * + * See the NOTICE file(s) distributed with this work for additional + * information regarding copyright ownership. + * + * This program and the accompanying materials are made available under the + * terms of the Eclipse Public License 2.0 which is available at + * http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0 + * + * SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0 + *******************************************************************************/ +package org.eclipse.hono.service.management; + +import java.util.ArrayList; +import java.util.List; +import java.util.Objects; + +import org.eclipse.hono.util.RegistryManagementConstants; + +import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude; +import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty; + +/** + * The result of a search operation in Device Registry Management API. + * + * @param The type of the result. + * @see Device Registry + * Management API - Search Tenants + * @see Device Registry + * Management API - Search Devices + */ +@JsonInclude(value = JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL) +public final class SearchResult { + private final int total; + private final List result; + + /** + * Creates an instance of {@link SearchResult}. + * + * @param total The total number of objects in the result set, regardless of the pageSize set in query. + * @param result The list of devices with their identifiers. + * @throws NullPointerException if any of the parameters is {@code null}. + */ + public SearchResult( + @JsonProperty(value = RegistryManagementConstants.FIELD_RESULT_SET_SIZE) final int total, + @JsonProperty(value = RegistryManagementConstants.FIELD_RESULT_SET_PAGE) final List result) { + Objects.requireNonNull(result); + + this.total = total; + this.result = new ArrayList<>(result); + } + + /** + * Gets the total number of objects in the result set, regardless of the pageSize set in query. + * + * @return the total number of objects in the result set. + */ + public int getTotal() { + return total; + } + + /** + * Gets the result list. + * + * @return the result list. + */ + public List getResult() { + return result;

replies.bodyText: I have changed to return an unmodifiable view on the list.
replies.author: kaniyan

timeline.message:
[#2239] Add OpenAPI spec for search tenants operation

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

[#2239] Pull up Filter and Sort classes for reuse

Pull up Filter and Sort classes to package org.eclipse.hono.service.management
for reuse by the search tenants operation.

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

[#2239] Prepare base classes required for search tenants operation

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

[#2239] Implement review suggestions

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

Return an unmodifiable view on the result list

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

Return an unmodifiable view on the result list

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>
